    • Method Detail

      • initDetector

        public void initDetector()
        If detector needs any initialization, it can be done in this method.

        For this case, the detectors network detection thread is made and started.

        Specified by:
        initDetector in interface IDeviceDetector

      • getRaspberryPiForIP

        public static RaspberryPi getRaspberryPiForIP(java.lang.String ip)
        Call this method to try to connect to the given IP.
        Parameters:
        ip - IP can be a multicast group or a device IP
        Returns:
        RaspberryPi instance or null if not found

      • getDeviceList

        public java.util.List<AbstractDevice> getDeviceList(java.util.Set<AbstractDevice> currentDevices)
        This method returns the current list of devices and requests a new scan
        Specified by:
        getDeviceList in interface IDeviceDetector
        Parameters:
        currentDevices - List of current devices, can be used to skip already connected devices
        Returns:
        List of Raspberry Pis detected
